name: taggedjs-dump
description: visually dump and interact with javascript and json objects

scripts.build: npm-run-all --sequential build:js build:webpack build:dist:only build:gh-pages && echo "âœ… Build completed"
scripts.build:gh-pages:old: cd ../gh-pages && npm install --install-links=false file:../main/dist --no-save && npm run build && echo "ðŸ”¬ Built gh-pages"
scripts.build:gh-pages: cp -R js/. ../gh-pages/node_modules/taggedjs-dump/js && cd ../gh-pages && npm run build && echo "ðŸ”­ Built gh-pages"
scripts.build:gh-pages:full: npm run build:js && npm run build:dist:only && npm run build:gh-pages
scripts.build:dist:only: cp README.MD ./dist/README.md && npm run build:dist:pack && rm -rf ./dist/js && cp -R js ./dist && cp -R ./dist/. ../dist
scripts.save:dist:git: cd ../dist && git add . && git commit -m "dist patch" && git push
scripts.save: git add . && git commit -m "patch" && git push
scripts.build:dist:pack: cp package.json ./dist/package.json && echo "âœ… copied package.json to ./dist" && node scripts/package-dist.cjs
scripts.publish: npm run build:dist && npm run save:dist && cd ../dist && npm publish

author: Acker Dawn Apple
